titles.title: Hallelujah, I Want To Sing All About Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, I want to sing all about Him, Hallelujah.
I want to shout all about Him, Hallelujah.
I can't live without Him, praise God. Praise God!
Now I'm living in the new creation.
Now I'm drinking at the well of salvation.
Now there is no condemnation, praise God!
